'''Reminiscent Drift''' is a [[Quest Domain]] in [[Sanctuary of Surasthana]] during the {{Quest|The Kabukimono's Finale}}.

==Trial Character==
{{Transclude|The Kabukimono's Finale|Trial Character}}

==Walkthrough==
# After dropping down the hole, there is a Common Chest on a ledge directly in front after the door. In the room below, there is a switch which will activate a ladder in case you dropped down before opening the chest.
# Proceed until the electric floor trap, where there is the second Common Chest.
# In the third memory, defeat the enemies:
#* Wave 1 {{Enemy List|Fatui Skirmisher - Geochanter Bracer*1;Fatui Skirmisher - Electrohammer Vanguard*1}}
#* Wave 2 {{Enemy List|Fatui Skirmisher - Hydrogunner Legionnaire*1;Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard*1}}
# The third Common Chest is in the alcove on the left, hidden by a pair of destructible room dividers.
# Continue through the portal.
# Defeat the enemies:
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Mirror Maiden*1}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Fatui Electro Cicin Mage*1;Fatui Pyro Agent*1}}
# Continue through the portal to the next memory.
# Defeat the enemy:
#* {{Enemy|Everlasting Lord of Arcane Wisdom|text=Everlasting Lord of Arcane Wisdom - The Omen at Memory's End}}

==Chests==
* [[Common Chest]] ×3
